treatment-md.title: Catapaguroides foresti Komai, Yamada & Shirakawa, 2010, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: A new hermit crab species of the genus Catapaguroides A. Milne-Edwards & Bouvier (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae) from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan, and additional record of C. foresti McLaughlin
